title: MARKET RESEARCH ANALYST
company_info: KAWASAKI HEAVY INDUSTRIES (SINGAPORE) PTE. LTD. IS 100 PERCENT OWNED BY KAWASAKI HEAVY INDUSTRIES LTD., JAPAN. OUR ACTIVITIES INCLUDES THE RENDERING OF SUPPORT SERVICES IN NEGOTIATIONS, LIAISON, RESEARCH, WARRANTY WORK AND OTHER RELATED SERVICES TO ITS HOLDING COMPANY AND ENGAGING IN CIVIL ENGINEERING BUSINESS PROJECTS.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job description
Based on the company and parent company business strategy, to devise a marketing and social implementation strategy of Kawasaki products in Southeast Asia (SEA) territory while using government subsidies and economic cooperation mechanisms.

Job scope includes but not limited to:
1.Research and analysis of decarbonization and carbon neutrality (hydrogen, ammonia, CCUS, etc.) in SEA/Oceania
・Research and analyze the general conditions of each country, domestic legal systems and policies, subsidy systems, names of related ministries and organizations, projects already in operation, major players, and the status of participation of Japanese companies, and report to the parent company.
・Gather information on potential business partners and public financing in Japan and SEA.
・Devise business schemes for the Kawasaki Group to participate in planned projects and future projects and conduct sales activities to related ministries and agencies and link them to orders by involving the parent company of Japan.

2.Survey on the reaction and attitude of SEA countries to AETI (Asia Energy Transition Initiative) and AZEC (Asia Zero Emission Community), and study on its applicability to our company business.

3.Building relationships with JICA, NEDO, JBIC and JETRO in SEA.

Job Requirements
・Business experience, knowledge, and strong interest in decarbonization and carbon neutrality.
・ More than 5 years working experience in government agencies.
・ Have experience in social implementation business of individual products.
・ Have strong links with the goverment of Japan and/or the Singapore in charge of economic policy
・ Graduate with degree of Bachelor or equivalent degree
・ Excellent negotiation, research and execution skill to built and maintain relationship with government agencies.
・ Proactive, positive attitude, open mindset and patient
・Proficiency in spoken and written Japanese language is mandatory for liaison, reporting, communication and presentation to the parent company in Japan.

title: MARKET RESEARCH ANALYST
company_info: One Visa is an immigration and recruitment firm that assists global companies in their relocation needs in Singapore. We have been in the industry for over 11 years and we are now looking for a dynamic candidate to join us in our quest to make a difference in the global immigration industry.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About the position:
Based in Singapore and supporting Philippines, you will contribute to the firm, by developing analysis and conveying insights to enhance clients’ decision making. You will play an active role in all aspects of client engagement: helping identify issues, forming hypotheses, conducting analysis, and synthesising conclusions into recommendations. The successful applicants will combine technical strength with a strong track record of leadership and performance in team-oriented environments. Successful candidates will work in a dynamic, intellectually stimulating, and demanding yet supportive environment. They will enjoy autonomy, the opportunity to substantially influence major decisions in the energy sector, and to grow into industry experts under the guidance of directors with deep experience addressing major strategic issues at the world’s leading advisory firms. The position suits a recent STEM graduate of a bachelor’s or master’s programme.

Key responsibilities.
Develop timely and rigorous quantitative analyses to enhance clients’ decision making.
Work closely with our modelling team, structuring economic problems into quantifiable analyses and deriving insights from the model results.
Contribute to our product development, by identifying new opportunities and expanding our capabilities.
Engage with clients to thoroughly understand their requirements.
Communicate findings to clients.
Required attributes:
First-class or high second-class degree in a quantitative subject (Mathematics, Economics, Physics, Engineering, Finance).
An ability to collect, analyse and interpret complex quantitative data and information.
Evidence of strong performance in team-oriented environments
An ability to communicate and collaborate with both technical and non-technical parties.

title: Market Research Analyst (Business Partnering)-SPSS,R
company_info: Recruit Haus (License Number: 10C5624) specializes in the technical and general recruitment of Permanent, Contract and Payroll Outsourcing for our clients in the following industries: Education Information Technology Construction / Engineering Pharmaceutical Logistics / Manufacturing Retail Property Management / Facilities Our extensive market knowledge and innovative network of candidates ensures connectivity to the right talent and increase our client's competitive advantage. We work with various type of organisations from local business to International / Multinational companies finding the right talent.
job_category: Accounting / Auditing / Taxation, Consulting, Marketing / Public Relations, Risk Management, Social Services
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:
You will be exposed to different social research domains and streams of research methodologies
Manage client-focused research projects, conduct analysis, and present insights in a visual and impactful manner. At the same time, you will be involved in scripting, sampling, and data processing of research studies.
Assist in developing new methods of data collection using various software and other data related tools assigned to you at intervals.
Account Management: Manage client queries, expectations and relationships to ensure client satisfaction
Design, plan, execute, and manage research projects suitable for client needs
Scripting of survey questionnaires with logic implementation
Processing of research data using software with syntaxes and codes
Monitor quantitative fieldwork and adhering to project schedules / deadlines
Quality check and audit survey implementation to ensure accuracy of results
Perform coding of open-ended (free text response) answers where required
Create highly actionable and digestible reports in PowerPoint
Present results of study confidently to external clients
Drive the exploration of new research methodologies and data collection software
Any other tasks as may be assigned by Head of Department
Requirements
Minimum Bachelor’s degree (in Social Sciences / Mathematics / Business / Engineering / numerical fields)
Willing to learn as training provided
Versatile individual with a keen interest to pick up complimentary research skillsets
Able to work with ambiguity and perform under pressure
Strong quantitative and data analytical skills required
Strong communication skills, both written and interpersonal
Competent in MS Office, with some experience in data collection and/or statistical software e.g. SPSS (must), R, STATA etc. is preferred

Interested candidates, do submit your resume in MSWord to cv.get@recruithaus.com.sg or contact 62251232

title: Market Research Analyst
company_info: TRADECRAFT SOLUTIONS PTE LTD. is a staffing firm specialized in the industry of FINTECH. Specifically in the up and coming realm of WEB 3.0
job_category: Banking and Finance, Consulting, Information Technology, Professional Services
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Position: Market Research Analyst

Work Eligibility: Singapore Permanent Resident (PR) or Citizen

Working Hours:

Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM (with flexibility)
Salary: Negotiable, based on qualifications and experience

Job Requirements:

Minimum of a college degree
2+ years of relevant market research experience in Singapore
Strong understanding of the Singapore market
Ability to quickly assess and report on market conditions for products
Location: Islandwide

Responsibilities:

Conduct market research to gather valuable insights and data
Analyze market trends, competitors, and consumer behavior
Provide timely and accurate reports on market conditions for various products
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support business decisions
Stay up-to-date with industry developments and emerging trends
Qualifications:

A bachelor's degree or higher in a relevant field
Proven experience in market research within the Singaporean market
Strong analytical and data interpretation skills
Excellent communication and presentation abilities
Proficiency in market research tools and software
Ability to work independently and in a team
Highly organized and detail-oriented
Benefits:
[Annual Leave, Medical Leave healthcare insurance, professional development, or a friendly work environment.]

Benjamin Aw (EA Reg. No. R22107090)
Tradecraft Solutions Pte. Ltd. (EA Lic. No. 23C1548)
